Egor Lynov Website

Hi, my name is Egor and this is basic information about me

My birthday is May 31, 1987, and I was born in Voronezh. Koltsov's Gymnasium was where I studied. I got carried away with сompetitive programming at school. As a specialty system programmer, I graduated from Voronezh State University's Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Mechanics. I started learning programming with Ruby and Ruby on Rails.

I've worked as a software engineer since 2012. I started working as a front-end developer, wrote in Java Script, used Angular and React. Then I switched to backend on Node.js. After that, I began to develop web applications on python, using Django. After that, I switched to developing distributed systems in Go using K8s and cloud technologies. I'm currently working on the infrastructure for ML and DS, using python and go.
